Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-20328 affecting package clamav for versions less than 1.0.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-20328 affecting package clamav for versions less than 1.0.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package clamav is earlier than 1.0.6-1, affected by CVE-2024-20328
